transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir, Sakshi baat kar rahi thi.
Customer: Madam, abhi puchh nahi, abhi to jaanna, kar raha tha main. Main keh raha ki mail to aa raha hai kya?
Executive: Haan, nahi mail aa raha hai? Check kar liya aapne?
Customer: Haan, OTP bhi aa raha hai, check kara usne.
Executive: Achha, okay. Aa raha hai na sir?
Customer: Haan, aa raha hai madam.
Executive: Achha, okay. Abhi isliye aap kal call kar rahe the? Aur koi concern to nahi tha sir?
Customer: Bas yahi tha madam, mera OTP nahi aa raha tha, main payment nahi ho rahi thi bina OTP ke.
Executive: Achha, achha, aapke mail pe nahi aa raha tha jo registered mail hai. Mail ke server mein koi dikkat thi.
Customer: To maine socha ki IndiaMART IndiaMART login nahi ho raha tha uska.
Executive: Achha, okay.
Customer: Koi nahi, fir abhi.
Executive: Nahi, nahi sir, IndiaMART matlab wo to aapki personal mail hai na sir, wo to hamare end se usme koi issue nahi aata hai. Main ye kehna chah raha hu ki jaise mera mail nahi aa raha tha na, to uski wajah se OTP nahi aa raha tha IndiaMART ka.
Executive: Achha, okay. To kabhi kabhi aisa hota hai na sir ki agar aapke mail ki history full ho jati hai to wo bounce karta hai, usse kuch bhi nahi aata. IndiaMART ki taraf se kya wo koi OTP bhi nahi aayegi.
Customer: Wo to khali tha madam, lekin server mein koi fault aa raha tha.
Executive: Achha, okay. Haan, wo kabhi kabhi glitch aa jata hai sir, shayad is wajah se. Google work space ka hai na, Google work space ka.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Google services.
Executive: Achha, okay. Samajh gaye. Aur main services ke liye bhi sir aapko call karna chah rahi thi kyunki sir aapko bhi pata hai ki last matlab wahi baat hui thi jab involve hua tha.
Customer: Okay madam, aaj to mushkil kar paunga kyunki main jaam mein khada tha. Abhi to main pahucha bhi nahi ghar. Ghar se office jaunga. To aap na kal call karna mere ko ek baar 10-15 ya 10:30 ke aas paas.
Executive: Theek hai. But sir Nikhil sir ye jo aapne kal aapka OTP wala concern tha na, wo just maine call nahi receive kar paya tha kyunki customer ke Sunday tha to main nahi pick kar payi thi. To sir abhi wo solve ho gaya isko main close kar du na? Koi issue to nahi hai?
Customer: Nahi, fir to close kar sakte ho.
Executive: Theek hai. Ek sir product ki de range, list ka bata dena ye add karna hai to main add bhi kar dungi isko. Plastic handles karte ho na deal isme?
Customer: Haan. Ye to sir aaj kal add kiya tha unhone sir ne.
Executive: Ah, ek baar main check kar leti hu agar wo add mujhe to nahi dikh raha hai add but ek baar dekh leti hu agar category add hai to theek hai nahi to main add kar deti hu.
Customer: Haan, mere se bata rahe the ki maine add kar diya.
Executive: Achha, okay. Aapne kiya hai? Ek baar main check kar leti hu sir.
Customer: Nahi, sir ne kiya hai jo customer care ko kaha tha na jinhone phone.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji. Kisne kiya tha? Achha, achha, ye jo uh.
Customer: Unhone ye ye book kara tha na mera ticket.
Executive: Haan, haan, haan. Jinse aapki kal baat hui thi.
Customer: Haan, jinse kal meri baat hui thi. But sir wo video meeting hui to nahi thi? Unhone aapko Google Meet ki link bheji thi but baat nahi ho payi aapse unki.
Customer: Haan, wo mail pe aayi thi na Google ki office ki link, lekin wo aayi nahi thi mere se. Aap unse.
Executive: Achha, achha. Aise isiliye main subah se call kar rahi thi lekin unhone add nahi kara. Add add ek second. Nahi, unhone nahi kara hai sir.
Customer: To ye plastic handle kar dena, main aapko fir bata dunga.
Executive: Nahi, main abhi add kar dungi. But sir ek cheez bataiye plastic handle hai to mujhe kis cheez ka handle hai? Matlab door ka hai ya fir kis cheez ka hai?
Customer: Box ka, box ka hai. Plastic handle hai. PP corrugated box ka, corrugated box ka.
Executive: To iska product name main kya dalu sir? PP corrugated box handle?
Customer: Haan, corrugated box handle dal do aap.
Executive: Corrugated box handle aur usme lekin sir ek cheez batao ye jo plastic handle hai aur aap deal karte ho corrugated plastic uh handle box mein. To maan lo agar main plastic handles mein category add karungi to sir aisa ye aapke paas har matlab plastic handle to bahut sari ho jati hai na kisi bhi cheez ki aapke paas aayegi.
Customer: To uska matlab aap corrugated box handle kar do madam.
Executive: Haan, wahi main keh rahi hu. To ek kaam karna sir aap matlab aaj bilkul bhi free nahi ho?
Customer: Haan, to madam main gaadi chala raha hu subah se ye time aa gaya madam.
Executive: Nahi, aapne bola tha na 5:00 baje tabhi. Koi nahi main.
Customer: Jaam lag raha tha, pehle jaam mein khada tha, abhi nikla hu waha se abhi.
Executive: Achha, achha, okay. Koi nahi matlab aap kab tak free bhi pahuchoge sir? Matlab koi idea hai? Jaise main to 6:00 baje tak available rehti hu. To agar.
Customer: 6:00 baje tak pahuchunga main.
Executive: Achha, 6:00 baje nahi pahuch payenge. Koi issue nahi hai. Ha, aur sir ek aur cheez bolna tha Nikhil sir, bas ek minute lagega. Main ye keh rahi thi aap call bahut zyada miss kar rahe ho sir. Itni calls agar miss karoge buyer.
Customer: Jo ab jo aati hai wo sab pe hai madam. Agar hum ghar pe nahi hai to back call kar dete hai hum unko.
Executive: Ah, call back to karte ho chalo theek hai lekin jab call aati hai na sir agar aap usko pick nahi karoge to jo calls matlab buyer ki aati hai na uska success rate kam hota hai to aapke paas future mein calls kam aane lagti hai sir. To main agar batau ek hafte mein saat call aayi hai aapke paas saat din mein but usme se aapne sirf aur sirf teen call receive kari hai sir. Baki char call aapne miss kar di hai. To isko thoda sa improve karo.
Customer: Madam, ghar pe nahi hote hai to uthate hai hum phone to.
Executive: Haan, actually mere mere paas jo data hai main sirf usi pe bol rahi hu Nikhil sir. Matlab aap dhyan dena agar aisa hai.
Customer: Chalo aage se dhyan rakhenge madam, mujhe zyada.
Executive: Haan, theek hai. To main ye tha sir aapki catalog sahi karke close kar de rahi hu. Aapke mail pe na mera ek feedback jayega to please usse closer de dena.
Customer: Theek, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai Nikhil sir, main kal call karti hu aapko.
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir. Thank you for calling.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's OTP was not being received.

- Customer wants to add plastic handles to catalog.

- Customer missing many buyer calls.



Resolution:

- OTP issue resolved; mail server issue.

- Executive will add corrugated box handle to catalog.

- Executive advised to improve call pick-up rate.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call the customer tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- otp, catalog, calls, plastic handles
